snippet: KOHNOP--Pearl, 97, on January 30. Devoted wife of the late Dr Ben Kohnop. Proud Hunter College grad. Avid reader, bridge and scrabble player, she enjoyed theater, art, ballet, music. Loving daughter, sister, doting aunt to three generations. She is missed by nieces and nephews, the joy of her life. Cedar Park Paramus February 7. FamilialDysautonomia.org 1/3
lead_paragraph: KOHNOP--Pearl, 97, on January 30. Devoted wife of the late Dr Ben Kohnop. Proud Hunter College grad. Avid reader, bridge and scrabble player, she enjoyed theater, art, ballet, music. Loving daughter, sister, doting aunt to three generations. She is missed by nieces and nephews, the joy of her life. Cedar Park Paramus February 7. FamilialDysautonomia.org 1/3
